title: Little Mouse
author: Little Mouse
created_time: September 26, 2023, 01:30:34 AMLast edit: October 04, 2023, 11:21:12 PM by Little Mouse
content: A. Predict and WinRules:Predict the score and win 2 mBTC. The rules are as follows-1. Predict the exact score of Real Madrid vs. Napoli2. Predict the minute of the first goal (Will be used for a tie above, write N/A in case of 0-0 prediction)3. Total foul (Will be used for a tie above)4. Share your shuffle username5. Must submit your entry before the Real Madrid vs. Napoli match starts.Prize1. Winner will have 2 mBTC in their shuffle account.2. To withdraw the mBTC, you must have 2x wagered them.3. If we have more than 1 winner, no increment in the prize pool. Winners will share the prize pool.Posting format1. Shuffle Username:2. Score:3. Minute of 1st goal:4. Total fouls:B. Place a bet and WinRulesThe rules are pretty much simple.1. Must have placed 1 bet worth 0.0002 BTC  in any of the Champion League Matches from Match day 2.2. Share your bet slip here.3. Your bet must have an odd of 1.4 or above.4. No alt account allowed.5. Winner will be picked by- https://bitcoindata.science/giveaway-manager/6. Must submit your entry before the first match starts.Prizes2 mBTC will be credited directly to your BTC address. Posting format1. Shuffle Username2. Segwit BTC address3. Your betslip screenshotWinners will be announced after the last match of the 2nd match day.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: People can participate in any of the events. It's not mandatory to participate in both.
